sn15.1:1.7: See BB’s note on anamatagga, and my note at https://discourse.suttacentral.net/t/on-the-unknowability-of-sa-sara/2859sc2
sn15.1:1.9: PTS has “a stack of squares” for caturangala, while BB curiously enough omits it entirely. But surely the meaning is as I have here. “small stick, tig” is a recognized meaning of ghatika.
